005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.AbstractCodedMetapathException;
009
010/**
011 * MPTY: Exceptions related to Metapath type errors.
012 */
013public class TypeMetapathException
014    extends AbstractCodedMetapathException {
015  /**
016   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXPTY0004">err:MPTY0004</a>: It
017   * is a <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-type-error">type error</a>
018   * if during the
019   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-analysis">static analysis
020   * phase</a>, an expression is found to have a
021   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-type">static type</a> that
022   * is not appropriate for the context in which the expression occurs, or during
023   * the <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-dynamic-evaluation">dynamic
024   * evaluation phase</a>, the
025   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-dynamic-type">dynamic type</a> of
026   * a value does not match a required type as specified by the matching rules in
027   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#id-sequencetype-matching">2.5.5
028   * SequenceType Matching</a>.
029   */
030  public static final int INVALID_TYPE_ERROR = 4;
031  /**
032   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXPTY0019">err:MPTY0019</a>: It
033   * is a <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-type-error">type error</a>
034   * if {@code E1} in a path expression {@code E1/E2} does not evaluate to a
035   * sequence of nodes.
036   */
037  public static final int BASE_PATH_NOT_A_SEQUENCE = 19;
038  /**
039   * The context item is not a node when evaluating an axis step.
040   */
041  public static final int NOT_A_NODE_ITEM_FOR_STEP = 20;
042
043  /**
044   * the serial version UID.
045   */
046  private static final long serialVersionUID = 2L;
047
048  /**
049   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, {@code message},
050   * and {@code cause}.
051   *
052   * @param code
053   *          the error code value
054   * @param message
055   *          the exception message
056   * @param cause
057   *          the original exception cause
058   */
059  public TypeMetapathException(int code, String message, Throwable cause) {
060    super(code, message, cause);
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, {@code message},
065   * and no cause.
066   *
067   * @param code
068   *          the error code value
069   * @param message
070   *          the exception message
071   */
072  public TypeMetapathException(int code, String message) {
073    super(code, message);
074  }
075
076  /**
077   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, no message, and
078   * the {@code cause}.
079   *
080   * @param code
081   *          the error code value
082   * @param cause
083   *          the original exception cause
084   */
085  public TypeMetapathException(int code, Throwable cause) {
086    super(code, cause);
087  }
088
089  @Override
090  public String getCodePrefix() {
091    return "MPTY";
092  }
093}
